name: towsonconnect
description: Towson Connect is a collaborative web application for Towson Teachers and students, developed for COSC 617: Advance Web Development. The application combines message boards and media spaces to provide an area where users can communicate, share, and grade files.

scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build

author: group 5
